"Oza":
"Well? You see how powerful double blades
can be now?"

"Their sheer number of attacks allows you to press
the enemy before they know what's happening.
There's no easy way to counter these weapons!"

"Anyway, I don't want to bother you in the middle of
your quest. Stop by and see me when you're
done, okay?"

"どうだ？
ダブルセイバーの強さ、肌で感じたか？"

"一気呵成とばかりに畳みかけるような
圧倒的な攻撃回数と圧力。
対処は容易ではあるまい。"

"……とと、まだクエスト中だったな。
まあ、帰還したら一度オレのところにも
顔を出してくれ。それじゃあな。"
